Summary: Data Lifecycle â€“ Historical vs Live Recordings Classification
Components: focus-server, mongodb, data-lifecycle, data-quality, data-integrity, recordings, cleanup
Objective: Validate that MongoDB correctly distinguishes between Historical (completed), Live (in-progress), and Deleted (cleanup) recordings. Verify recording lifecycle management and cleanup service functionality.
Pre-Conditions: PC-010: MongoDB reachable; PC-013: Recording collection exists; PC-021: GUID-based collection; PC-022: base_paths has GUID; PC-023: Active/historical recordings exist
Expected Result: Historical: ~99%, Live: <1% (recent), Deleted: <1%, Invalid: 0, Stale: 0. All recordings have start_time. Classification totals match. Historical are majority (>50%). Live recordings recent (<24h).
